name: orchestr8
description: Complete autonomous software engineering organization with 72 specialized agents, 19 autonomous workflows, and revolutionary ZERO-CONFIG code intelligence system. Features fully autonomous line-based indexing that works with ALL languages (Python, TypeScript, Java, Go, Rust, C++, Ruby, PHP, and everything else). Global SQLite database in ~/.claude/ with automatic hooks for Write/Edit operations - no Docker, no PostgreSQL, no manual indexing required. Reduces token usage by 80-95% through precise line-level queries. Self-extending plugin architecture with meta-orchestration, multi-stage code review, enterprise compliance, game development, AI/ML, and blockchain/Web3 support. Install once, forget forever, work 8+ hours without context limits.
